Here we list some ideas for your AGDS Proseminar projects: questions to be answered and patterns to be verified with data. These are suggestions for project proposals, which you can work on directly or take as inspiration to define your own. Naturally, this list is not exhaustive and we encourage you to come up with a project that truly peeks your interest. The datasets listed below are just a starting point and you may need to gather more data for your project implementation.
